    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: from pandas import DataFrame
    5: 
    6: 
    7: @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    8:     "data, index, expected",
    9:     [
   10:         ({"col1": [1], "col2": [3]}, None, 2),
   11:         ({}, None, 0),
   12:         ({"col1": [1, np.nan], "col2": [3, 4]}, None, 4),
   13:         ({"col1": [1, 2], "col2": [3, 4]}, [["a", "b"], [1, 2]], 4),
   14:         ({"col1": [1, 2, 3, 4], "col2": [3, 4, 5, 6]}, ["x", "y", "a", "b"], 8),
   15:     ],
   16: )
   17: def test_size(data, index, expected):
   18:     # GH#52897
   19:     df = DataFrame(data, index=index)
   20:     assert df.size == expected
   21:     assert isinstance(df.size, int)
